msg: Update Ant build script to be sure to include the MessageBundle property files in juddi.jar.

msg: Fix for bug# JUDDI-69 - Added the missing 'direction' attribute. (see: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JUDDI-69)

author: sviens
msg: Implement internationalization support.  Also fix for bug# JUDDI-68 - ErrInfo element not found in E_success messages.
